topics.body: Anyone else having the issue with YT that, when you go into your history, it'll say something like "Watch History (9,050 videos)", but when you scroll down, it'll stop scrolling after about, say, ninety or so videos? That's still a lot, sure, but old YT would let you see all 9,050 videos. Is that feature gone? And if so what's the point of telling me how many of your videos are in your history when they...aren't?
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53604e4363687215225a0100#post_53604e4363687215225a0100
Yes! Only mine doesn't even go by 30 or 20.

Youtube literally doesn't have history anymore from what I'm looking at, just things you saw recently those 4 days.

and sometimes, things _DONT_ show up in your history even if you've never seen em before.

topics.body: Breaking Bad is about the pride and envy of a man being subdued for years, and when he finally gets a chance to prove he's as good as he thinks he is, he will go any lenght to prove it, from lying about his motives to even lower practices at the expense of his morality.
